orchestration¶

Orchestration module.

orchestration module provide functions to orchestration service of Fujitsu K5 cloud REST API
k5lib.orchestration.create_stack(project_token, region, project_id, stack_name, template)¶

Create a new stack into project.

Parameters:
  • project_token – A valid K5 project token
  • region – K5 region name.
  • project_id – ID of the project
  • stack_name – The name of a stack to be created. Specify a string of halfwidth alphanumeric characters, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.), and that starts with a letter. The maximum length is 255 characters. Subsequent characters are ignored.
  • template – A valid JSON.
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error code from requests library.
k5lib.orchestration.delete_stack(project_token, region, project_id, stack_name, stack_id)¶

Delete_stack.

Parameters:
  • project_token – A valid K5 project token
  • region – K5 region name.
  • project_id – ID of the project
  • stack_name – Name of the stack
  • stack_id – ID of the stack
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error code from requests library.
k5lib.orchestration.get_stack_id(project_token, region, project_id, stack_name)¶

Get stack ID.

Parameters:
  • project_token – A valid K5 project token
  • region – K5 region name.
  • project_id – ID of the project
  • stack_name – Name of the stack
Returns:

Stack ID if succesfull. Otherwise error code from requests library.
k5lib.orchestration.get_stack_info(project_token, project_id, region, stack_name, stack_id)¶

Get detailed stack info.

Parameters:
  • project_token – A valid K5 project token
  • region – K5 region name.
  • project_id – ID of the project
  • stack_name – Name of the stack
  • stack_id – ID of the stack
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error code from requests library.
k5lib.orchestration.list_stacks(project_token, region, project_id)¶

List stacks in project.

Parameters:
  • project_token – A valid K5 project token
  • region – K5 region name.
  • project_id – ID of the project
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error code from requests library.
